Developed by: Adhithya Rajagopal\nCurrent Version: 1.0\nFor more info go to bit.ly/QuantumThemer
Seems like your phone is not rooted..
Seems like your phone does not have Busybox..\nHowever, you are rooted. You can Install busybox from Play Store
Extract required files to SD Card
The Theme is applied on phone Startup as an init.d script
Set Root as Initial Directory while browsing themes(Requires Restart of App)
Use other File browsers Installed on Phone

Myriad is a simple and highly functional custom ROM for Mediatek (MT6589) devices. It is based on pure AOSP and gives ultimate vanilla experience. It is based on Android 4.2.2 JellyBean. The ROM has a simplified UI and many powerful apps to control the ROM. It is user friendly and stable. Some of the unique features of this ROM are Floating apps including Float Caller , Xposed Framework with GravityBox for full customization ,OG Battery Mod for amazing battery styles, ViperFX for the best music Experience , Myriad Control Centre for complete control of your Phone. It uses some parts of Pure Performance tweaks and some of its own for best possible performance of the ROM and moreover these tweaks can easily be switched on and off. There are some other fun features like framework animation, custom fonts, HTC Sense Style Recent Task just to name a few. Overall this ROM is a solid package of all components which a daily user requires.
Q. Left Capacitive Button shows recent menu!
Q. How to change lockscreen wallpaper?
Q. Some features of Gravity Box doesn’t work!
Q. Quick Settings tiles have disappeared!
Q. Network Signal Bar disappears when orientation is changed!
Q. Dialer keypad not oriented properly!
Q. Mobile freezes while chaning recent app style!
Q. Reboot Option not found in Power Menu pop up!

A. To accommodate the shortcut for floating apps the capacitive button have been reconfigured.\nLong press of left button will take you to floating apps launch pad. For the actual function of left capacitive buttons a 3 dot menu can be found in most of the apps
A. Go to Settings -> Control Centre -> UI Tab -> Lockscreen
A. This ROM has some stuff which work on custom framework and Gravity Box doesn’t support this. So some features won’t work. This is neither the ROM nor Gravity Box error

A. This happens as Gravity Box takes over the quick settings tiles. You can customize what tile you want by doing this\nGo to Settings -> Control Center-> General-> Gravity Box -> Status bar tweaks -> Quick Settings Management->Status bar Quick Settings titles

A. This usually doesn’t happen, but occurs when the screen orientation is changed continuously a couple of times. Although the signal bar disappears, the network connection is not interrupted.
To get back:
1. Try switching data connection off and then on
2. If the above doesn’t work , go to Settings-> SIM Management -> Switch the SIM off and on again
A. This is due to higher dpi of the mobiles which I ported from. I am trying to fix it. Rest assured all the dialer functions is working properly
A. Yes, this normal the mobile will freeze for a minute or so and then reboot itself.
A. If the themer fails to work check these\n1. Make sure you have SD card\n2. Go to Settings -> Control Centre -> General Tab-> Themer Settings -> Re Run Set Up Environment
A. This can easily be enabled, follow this\nGo to Settings-> Control Centre -> Gravity Box -> Power Tweaks -> Check Advanced Reboot Menu
